name.ja: アザミナ・ハマルティア

text.en: Reveal 1 "Azamina" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and shuffle 1 "Sinful Spoils" card from your GY and/or banishment into the Deck for every 4 Levels the revealed monster has, then Special Summon it. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Sinful Spoils" Spell/Trap in your GY; Set it, but it cannot be activated this turn. You can only use 1 "Azamina Hamartia" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
